people. Remember when Sen. Bernie Sanders Boehner promised a 100 Billion in spending cuts just in the first year if they won in Nov. 2010. Here is the actual quote from their`` Pledge to America''. The 50-year-old actress- who plays scathing cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester on the US TV show- believes there are many similarities between the teacher and the straight-talking talent show judge. She said: If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her.`` He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her. Franchise tag will be part of negotiating game for players, NFL Will the Eagles be able to use the franchise tag to keep Michael Vick off the open market? I assume if the union does not believe that the franchise tag can be applied that they will challenge that through the normal process, Goodell said as he met with reporters in Arlington, Texas.
